description: Trump’s approach to  has been a polarizing topic... But he’s dead-on about using tariffs to communicate with China (as I explain in today’s opening rant). That’s why it’s important to ignore the noise… and the selloff in the markets. In fact, I’ve been finding more opportunities recently than I have in the past two years.
